title: Bahadurpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
text:
Bahadurpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is an <a href="Vidhan%20Sabha">assembly</a> constituency in <a href="Darbhanga%20district">Darbhanga district</a> in the <a href="India">India</a>n <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">state</a> of <a href="Bihar">Bihar</a>.
Overview.
As per Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly constituencies Order, 2008, No. 85 Bahadurpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is composed of the following: Bahadurpur and Hanuman Nagar <a href="Community%20Development%20Block%20in%20India">community development blocks</a>.
Bahadurpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is part of No. 14 <a href="Darbhanga%20%28Lok%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Darbhanga (Lok Sabha constituency)</a>.
Election Results.
Assembly Elections 2020.
